rdgGrp.rdg: As we entered this city, our minds were filled with the remembrance of the events that had been transacted there more than a century and a half <pb n="026" xml:id="F1818_v3_030"/>before. It was here that Charles I. had collected his forces. This city had remained faithful to him, after the whole nation had forsaken his cause to join the standard of parliament and liberty.

It was here that Charles I. had collected his forces. This city had remained faithful to him, after the whole nation had forsaken his cause to join the standard of parliament and liberty.
